answerText: IR spectroscopy [or infrared spectroscopy][10] The stretching mode of alipathic carbonyl compounds appear around this wavenumber on an IR spectrogram. Round to the nearest 100 inverse centimeters.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Rutgers and Virginia A | 3 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The fingerprint region in this technique's readout appears between 500 to 1500 inverse centimeters, and this technique is most useful for detecting functional groups. For 10 points each: [10] Name this technique which uses radiation of a longer wavelength than visible light to probe the vibrational modes of compounds.
